text: It was a warm, still evening; the plop of fish and the gentle putter of the engine were infinitely soothing after city noises, and I began to look forward to my life on the water. At last he pronounced me riverworthy and wanted to know when I would be moving in.
handwritten_text: It was a warm, still evening; the plop of fish and the gentle putter of the engine were infinitely soothing after city noises, and I began to look forward to my life on the water. At last he pronounced me riverworthy and wanted to know when I would be moving in.
